title: News24.com | Risk factors: 9 major takeaways from Ramaphosa’s lockdown speech
description: Cigarettes will be sold, some sectors of the economy will be allowed to reopen - but caution is the word of the day as President Cyril Ramaphosa announces a partial easing of the lockdown from 1 May
content:
President Cyril Ramaphosa has announced that as of 1 May, some measures of the nationwide lockdown implemented in March will be eased.
The easing of restrictions will focus on reviving economic activity, and Ramaphosa said on Thursday stringent public health… [+5444 chars]
